• Degrades resolution linearly over time with user-defined final scale
  • Applies audio degradation via low-pass filtering and bitcrushing for videos
  • Outputs GIFs for images and WebM videos for clips with preview/download
    bits = 16 - Math.floor(15 * tNorm * crushAmount);

The Go Go Gadget Pixel Reducer processes images and videos through controlled degradation sequences. For videos, it dynamically reduces resolution while applying audio filtering and bit-depth reduction during playback. Users can export GIF animations from images or degraded WebM videos with custom quality settings.
